description: Quickly seared tuna steak, ready cooked rice and a simple zingy dressing make this a quick and easy lunch or dinner.
keywords: Poke bowl,Tree nut free,Egg free,Fish,Rice,Mango,Avocado,Spinach,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Seared Tuna & Edamame Poke Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g wholegrain rice, 2 packs of 250g each, ready cooked
2 large avocado, halved and cut into cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a pan of water to the boil and cook the edamame for 5 minutes. Drain and set aside. Heat the rice according to pack instructions, pour into a bowl and fluff with a fork.
Heat a large griddle pan until smoking hot, brush the tuna steaks on each side with oil and cook for 2 minutes on each side for medium. Set aside to rest.
Whisk the lime juice and half the zest, sesame oil, soy sauce and green chilli together in a small bowl.
Divide the rice between 4 bowls and in separate sections add the edamame, spinach, mango, avocado and cucumber. Top the rice with sliced tuna steak, drizzle over the dressing and serve.
